import React, { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import { notifyError, notifySuccess, ToastContainer } from '../utils/toast'; import './contact.css' const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_z0x1htt', 'template_w7wsgmu', form.current, 'Dg9Ke35rdU-swI1yg') .then((result) => { console.log("success", result.text) notifySuccess("Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.") }, (error) => { console.log("error", error.text) notifyError("Oops, something went wrong. Please try submitting your message again.") }); e.target.reset() }; return (
